001package andesite.util;
002
003import javax.annotation.Nonnull;
004import java.util.Arrays;
005import java.util.Iterator;
006import java.util.NoSuchElementException;
007
008/**
009 * Circular buffer of bytes. When the buffer is full, adding a new element
010 * removes the oldest. Insertion and random access are O(1).
011 */
012public class ByteRingBuffer implements Iterable<Byte> {
013    private final byte[] array;
014    private int position;
015    private int size;
016    
017    public ByteRingBuffer(int size) {
018        if(size < 1) {
019            throw new IllegalArgumentException("Size < 1");
020        }
021        this.array = new byte[size];
022    }
023    
024    /**
025     * Stores a value into this buffer. If the buffer is full, the
026     * oldest value is removed.
027     *
028     * @param value Value to store.
029     */
030    public void put(byte value) {
031        array[position] = value;
032        position = (position + 1) % array.length;
033        size = Math.min(size + 1, array.length);
034    }
035    
036    /**
037     * Clears this buffer.
038     */
039    public void clear() {
040        position = 0;
041        size = 0;
042        Arrays.fill(array, (byte) 0);
043    }
044    
045    /**
046     * Returns the sum of all values on this buffer.
047     *
048     * @return The sum of all values on this buffer.
049     */
050    public int sum() {
051        //safe to sum all values because the array is zeroed in clear()
052        var sum = 0;
053        for(var v : array) {
054            sum += v;
055        }
056        return sum;
057    }
058    
059    /**
060     * Returns the size of this buffer.
061     *
062     * @return The size of this buffer.
063     */
064    public int size() {
065        return size;
066    }
067    
068    /**
069     * Returns the {@code n}th element of this buffer. An index of 0
070     * returns the oldest, an index of {@code size() - 1} returns the
071     * newest.
072     *
073     * @param n Index of the wanted element.
074     *
075     * @return The value of the {@code n}th element.
076     *
077     * @throws NoSuchElementException If {@code n >= size()}.
078     */
079    public byte get(int n) {
080        if(n >= size) {
081            throw new NoSuchElementException();
082        }
083        return array[sub(position, size - n, array.length)];
084    }
085    
086    /**
087     * Returns the last element of this buffer. Equivalent to
088     * {@code getLast(0)}.
089     *
090     * @return The last element.
091     *
092     * @throws NoSuchElementException If this buffer is empty.
093     */
094    public byte getLast() {
095        return getLast(0);
096    }
097    
098    /**
099     * Returns the {@code n}th last element of this buffer. An
100     * index of 0 returns the newest, an index of {@code size() - 1}
101     * returns the oldest.
102     *
103     * @param n Index of the wanted element.
104     *
105     * @return The value of the {@code n}th last element.
106     *
107     * @throws NoSuchElementException If {@code n >= size()}.
108     */
109    public byte getLast(int n) {
110        if(n >= size) {
111            throw new NoSuchElementException();
112        }
113        return array[sub(position, n + 1, array.length)];
114    }
115    
116    @Nonnull
117    @Override
118    public Iterator<Byte> iterator() {
119        return new Iterator<>() {
120            private int cursor = position;
121            private int remaining = size;
122            
123            @Override
124            public boolean hasNext() {
125                return remaining > 0;
126            }
127            
128            @Override
129            public Byte next() {
130                var v = array[cursor];
131                cursor = inc(cursor, array.length);
132                remaining--;
133                return v;
134            }
135        };
136    }
137    
138    private static int sub(int i, int j, int modulus) {
139        if((i -= j) < 0) i += modulus;
140        return i;
141    }
142    
143    private static int inc(int i, int modulus) {
144        if(++i >= modulus) i = 0;
145        return i;
146    }
147}
